title: How Many Calories in a Cuties?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in cuties, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition facts per fruit for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cuties?
assumptions: One medium Cuties mandarin orange (~74g), fresh, peeled and eaten; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fruit size, ripeness, variety, and brand; values are averages. Check packaging when available.

quick_answer.text: One Cuties mandarin orange provides ~35 kcal and ~9 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Eat two Cuties instead of one
Cuties segments in light syrup (drained, per fruit equivalent)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Cuties?
faqs.a: About 35 kcal for one medium Cuties mandarin orange.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in cuties?
faqs.a: One Cuties has ~9 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Do cuties have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimalâ€”~1 g protein and 0.2 g fat per fruit.
Roughly 3 medium Cuties provide about 105 kcal.
Yes, only ~1 mg sodium per fruit, making them heart-friendly.
